Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.messaging

Interface Transmittable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Message
All Known Implementing Classes:
Activity, Alert, Announcement, CompressibleCollection.CompressionEvent, CriticalAlert, EnsureFailure, FatalProblem, Glitch, Information, Narration, OperationFailed, OperationHalted, OperationLifecycleMessage, OperationMessage, OperationStarted, OperationStatusMessage, OperationSucceeded, Problem, Quibble, StepFailure, StepIncomplete, StepSuccess, Trace, Unsupported, Warning
public interface Transmittable
A message object that can be transmitted with a Broadcaster and received by a Listener. Although Message is the primary implementor Transmittable any class can implement this interface and participate in the messaging framework.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
